description: spherical bottle with painted human mask on tapering neck; shoulder area of vase carries two human arms, with hands, finished at shoulders with stylized puma heads; on back of jug a painted band terminating in two birds' heads, and scattered over surface of upper body a series of painted circle dots; flat bottom, stand; this type of jug, but with fully modeled face, popular in Pachacamac region
title: Bottle with painted human mask
